resources.string: The Following Information are needed for creating the event Event Name,Event Venue,Event Location,Event Time and Event Date
Sorry, there\'s no web browser available

Dear Admissions Committee, This is with regard to Mr. Vinoth Kumar M, who is applying at your university for graduate studies .I had known Vinoth Kumar M since his third year as an undergraduate student who came to my firm as an intern employee. This interaction with him provided me sufficient information to gauge and asses the intellectual capability and analytical skills. I would rank him as the one of the best intern students who came to Spark Droid. During my association with Mr. Vinoth Kumar M, I had an opportunity to observe him closely. I found him hardworking with a methodical and logical approach in his projects and the tasks that we gave in our firm. In office he was very sincere and regular and had a willingness to learn. As a CEO, I was able to observe his ability to work with counter parts and even with his seniors employee is exemplary. With his pleasing manners, proficiency in communicating his ideas effectively, he has established an excellent rapport with his fellow team members and the clients. He has brilliant team leader skills and is competent of extracting the best out of his team members. He also has good teaching capabilities. Considering his motivation, perseverance and intelligence, I strongly believe that he will scale the highest peaks in his fields of interest. In view of all the above facts, I strongly recommend him, without any hesitation, for admission into your graduate program with possible financial assistance, and would like to recommend him to qualify as a teaching/research assistant in your university Mr.Ramkumar Vlemurugan Founder CEO SPARK DROID (www.spkdroid.com) Tamil Nadu, INDIA
